name: Advantage Club
headline: Global platform for employee engagement with rewards&flexible benefits
description: Advantage Club is a global platform for employee engagement including rewards, flexible benefits, perks and communities. We are currently live with 1000+ companies across 100+ countries and have a ARR of ~$8m. Our revenue has grown ~4x in the last 1 year.

founders.name: Sourabh Deorah, Founder
founders.description: Before starting Advantage Club worked at Amazon(Cupertino) and Microsoft (Bellevue). At Amazon got a chance to build the first version of platform search for Amazon devices

## Global Employee Solutions On a Single Platform!
![R&R](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/18817/a21432e60e.webp)
Advantage Recognition 
Digitize and automate your R&R policy and reward employees for their efforts with reporting. 
![](https://cdn3.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/18823/3a60d82ef6.webp)![](https://cdn3.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/18822/111a45031d.webp)![](https://cdn0.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/18821/91c19a0053.webp)
  * Reward your employees on their efforts!
  * Digitize your R&R policy seamlessly
  * Integrate with global HRIS & employee communication tools
  * Define workflows and get realtime analytics and dashboards


[Learn More ![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/18780/5a2fc98d24.webp)](https://www.advantageclub.co/</pages/employee-rewards-and-recognition-program>)
![sales_contest](https://cdn0.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/18812/cb2096bfb9.webp)
Advantage Incentive Automation 
Streamline contest creation, define rule engines and automate incentive calculation. 
![](https://cdn0.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/18827/d8b72a36c0.webp)![](https://cdn0.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/18829/e3787d4060.webp)![](https://cdn1.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/18828/0f0f17ad9b.webp)
  * Easily create sales contests with minimal effort
  * No manual calculations required
  * Streamline contest creation, management, tournaments, leagues and implementation
  * Diverse leaderboards to drive healthy competition
  * App-based, monitor sales team standings while they are on the move


[Learn More ![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/18780/5a2fc98d24.webp)](https://www.advantageclub.co/</pages/sales-incentive-compensation-management-software>)
![vouchers_gifting](https://cdn0.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/18815/21f8b36a39.webp)
Advantage Marketplace 
Celebrate moments that matter with curated gift cards, products and branded merchandise. 
![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/18831/19a9336d02.webp)![](https://cdn1.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/18830/112de2d31a.webp)![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/18832/3443923e2e.webp)
  * Celebrate Moments That Matter and make them special
  * Welcome new joinees, express appreciation, celebrate birthdays, anniversaries, festivals, occasions and more!
  * Automated rewards for birthdays, anniversaries and onboarding without any manual intervention


[Learn More ![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/18780/5a2fc98d24.webp)](https://www.advantageclub.co/</pages/corporate-employee-gifting-platform>)
![ac_care](https://cdn1.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/18814/a8074a8fcb.webp)
Advantage Wellness 
Drive social wellbeing through milestone based group step challenges with leaderboards. 
![](https://cdn3.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/21302/79f2239a69.gif)
  * AI-driven platform for OPD plans, health checkups, fitness and wellness
  * Comprehensive integrated flex solution for medical consultations, health checkups, medications, and fitness programs
  * Real-time app engagement with fitness trackers, stepathon, social/team objectives, and personalized AI-guiders exercise plans tailored to individual needs
  * Proven 80%+ redemption for the assigned budgets impacting a large part of the workforce


[Learn More ![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/18780/5a2fc98d24.webp)](https://www.advantageclub.co/</pages/corporate-employee-wellness-software>)
![communitites](https://cdn3.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/18811/28efbe52d5.webp)
Advantage Communities 
Bring life to your Employee Resource Groups, connecting like-minded employees together. 
![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/18837/bcc8812a5a.webp)![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/18838/147f4890c9.webp)![](https://cdn1.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/18839/aeacd84657.webp)
  * Bring life to your ERG initiatives with confluence of like-minded people together
  * Create hobby clubs, mentor-mentee groups, support groups, leadership influencer clubs and more
  * Moderated communities for better controls and effective communication


[Learn More ![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/18780/5a2fc98d24.webp)](https://www.advantageclub.co/</pages/workplace-community-building-software>)

  * Use interactive tools like Surveys, Polls, Quizzes, Mood-O-Meters and Question-of-the-day
  * Gain valuable feedback, drive participation, get precise findings to create a future ready workplace

## How we co-build cultures across varied industries...
<
![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/12340/8a5e505e1d.webp) ![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/12776/eca57ee93b.webp) ![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/12775/c4505bcebe.webp)
A tech giant with over 20,000 employees faced the challenge of enhancing employees' work from home experience during the pandemic. Advantage Club offered an exclusive solution, enabling employees to access remote work resources and facilities seamlessly. Advantage Club was able to create a special marketplace with 400 SKU’s including chairs, tables, routers, UPS and more, within 10 days of getting the requirement during the pandemic, with end to end order management and delivery. The solution evolved into a successful full-fledged R&R platform, continuing to run effectively with Advantage Club. 
![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/12340/8a5e505e1d.webp) ![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/12776/eca57ee93b.webp) ![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/12775/c4505bcebe.webp)
A globally-renowned consulting firm desired a gamified Reward & Recognition portal that would ignite the importance of peer-to-peer appreciation among their workforce, and create a holistic wellbeing solution for their employees across the Middle Eastern and Asia regions. Advantage Club solved it through design thinking, and delivered a curated platform which magnified user connect on the platform and drove the need of appreciation and recognition as an inherent part of their culture. A custom wellbeing portal was also created, looking after employees, their dependents/family members. With a global catalog, the marketplace was customized for employees as per their country, thereby offering choices and an ease of convenience in the redemption process. 
![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/12340/8a5e505e1d.webp) ![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/12776/eca57ee93b.webp) ![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/12775/c4505bcebe.webp)
A leading global IT & consulting company with a large employee base of more than 300,000 operating in a Hybrid scenario, were seeking a solution focussed on holistic employee health and well-being, including curated FlexBen offerings. Our human-centric product design engineers offered them a customized platform offering services in four domains with the more than 20 varied solutions matching the need of their diverse workforce. Advantage Club was successful in driving 92% redemption in the first year itself, creating the best success story for the program ever run in the company before. 
![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/12340/8a5e505e1d.webp) ![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/12776/eca57ee93b.webp) ![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/12775/c4505bcebe.webp)
A Multinational IT Solutions company was seeking a platform that provides equitable rewards for employees across different countries and diverse groups. Advantage Club’s curated product offering with purchase parity features not only solved their need, rather magnified the employee experience multifold. Along with rewards, Advantage Club was also able to automate long service awards, create gamified solutions for reward point accrual, and provide an end to end gamified wellness solution. The solution was deployed across 120 countries with multiple business units, teams and workflows customized on the tool. 
![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/12340/8a5e505e1d.webp) ![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/12776/eca57ee93b.webp) ![](https://cdn2.workadvantage.in/images/cdn_upload/cdn/12775/c4505bcebe.webp)
A USA based global multinational business services & CX company with varied cultural backgrounds, sought a no-breakage solution for employee rewards. Advantage Club successfully delivered a platform catering to their unique needs, ensuring seamless and personalised rewards for their employees including engaging through communities and creating fun-at-workplace using Funzone. After deploying Advantage Club, their utilization rate and redemption rate for rewards shot up to 90-95%, as compared to their older rates of 40-60% with their incumbent platform earlier.

Advantage Club offered an exclusive solution, enabling employees to access remote work resources and facilities seamlessly. The solution evolved into a successful full-fledged R&R platform, continuing to run effectively with Advantage Club.

A globally-renowned consulting firm desired a gamified Reward & Recognition portal that would ignite the importance of peer-to-peer appreciation among their workforce, and create a holistic wellbeing solution for their employees across the Middle Eastern and Asia regions. Advantage Club solved it through design thinking, and delivered a curated platform which magnified user connect on the platform and drove the need of appreciation and recognition as an inherent part of their culture. A custom wellbeing portal was also created, looking after employees, their dependents/family members. With a global catalog, the marketplace was customized for employees as per their country, thereby offering choices and an ease of convenience in the redemption process.

generated_description:
**Advantage Club: Empowering Employee Engagement Globally**

Founded in 2016 and proudly part of the Y Combinator Batch S21, Advantage Club is making waves in the employee engagement space. Headquartered in Gurugram, India, this fast-growing startup operates on a global scale, with over 1,000 companies and 5 million users across 100+ countries. The company offers a comprehensive platform that combines rewards, flexible benefits, perks, and community-focused solutions designed to cultivate a more engaged workforce.

**Key Stats:**
- **Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR):** Approximately $8 million, reflecting a remarkable growth of about 4x in the past year.
- **Team Size:** 220 employees.

**Core Offerings:**
Advantage Club specializes in several key areas:
1. **Employee Rewards & Recognition (Advantage Recognition):** A digitized platform allowing seamless management of rewards, from budget allocation to redemption.
2. **Marketplace Solutions (Advantage Marketplace):** A curated space for gifting, offering personalized vouchers and gifts tailored to various occasions.
3. **Wellness Initiatives (Advantage Wellness):** Comprehensive health and wellness programs featuring health tracking and gamified fitness challenges.
4. **Incentive Automation (Advantage Incentive):** User-friendly tools for generating sales contests and motivating teams with engaging leaderboards.
5. **Community Building (Advantage Communities):** Creating spaces for employees to connect with shared interests to foster a sense of belonging.
6. **Feedback Mechanisms (Advantage Pulse):** Capturing real-time employee sentiments through surveys, polls, and quizzes.

**Achievements & Accolades:**
Advantage Club has garnered recognition not only for its innovative approach but also for its significant impact on employee satisfaction and engagement. This is evidenced by high redemption rates, with some clients reporting an increase in utilization to 90-95% for their engagement programs.

**Future Outlook:**
With ambitious plans for expansion and continuous improvement of its offerings, Advantage Club is well-positioned to shape the future of employee engagement. They are creating a world where workforce happiness and fulfillment are paramount, catering to the evolving needs of modern employees.

In summary, Advantage Club represents a forward-thinking approach to HR tech, making it a go-to partner for organizations keen to enhance their employee engagement strategies. For further information or to explore their offerings, visit [Advantage Club](https://www.advantageclub.co).
